notes: eBay inventory quantity is stored inside the InventoryItem's availability object. There is no separate inventory endpoint — it's always part of the product record. Use bulkUpdatePriceQuantity for efficient delta updates.
datetime_format: Not provided in the inventory response — use current timestamp on sync.

fields.name: offer.status
fields.description: Whether the listing is live. PUBLISHED = active offer.

fields.name: condition
fields.description: Item condition string (see product schema for values)
